title: FS: Matty, Chance, Tinker, Bender, Persons - New Price Reductions
author: ahumes13

posts.post_title: FS: Matty, Chance, Tinker, Bender, Persons - New Price Reductions
posts.post_content:
Hello,

I have the following T206 cards for sale - PRICES REDUCED:

Mathewson Dark Cap - PSA 4 - SC 350/30 - SOLD net via PP

Chance Portrait (Yellow) - PSA 3 - SC 460/25 (19th toughest back per T206 Resource rankings, between EPDG and Tolstoi) - [STRIKE]$225[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$200[/STRIKE] $175 net via PP

Tinker Bat Off - SGC 1.5 - Polar Bear - SOLD net via PP

Bender Portrait - PSA 2 - P150 - SOLD net via PP

Persons - SGC 1 - P350 (crazy front, likely due to chemicals from former back adhesive) - [STRIKE]$100[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$75[/STRIKE] $55 net via PP

First to say I'll take it via PM/email/post gets it, willing to entertain offers. Let me know if would like additional scans or pictures.

Have a good weekend!

Andy
I’ll take this per PM - Mathewson Dark Cap - PSA 4 - SC 350/30

Thanks for the purchase, will get that in the mail tomorrow.
